text: visvasiccavare, ninnal allahuveat pascattapikkuka. atmarthamaya pascattapam. ninnalute nathan ninnalute tinmakal mayiccukalayukayum talbhagattute arukalealukunna svargiyaramannalil ninnale pravesippikkukayum ceytekkam. allahu tanre pravacakaneyum kuteyulla visvasikaleyum nindikkatta dinamanat. avarute munnilum valatubhagattum tannalutetanne prakasam prasariccukeantirikkum. avar parayum: nannalute natha! nannalute prakasam nannalkku ni purttikariccu tarename! nannaleat ni pearukkename! ni ellarrinum kalivurravantanne; tircca
